title: Tech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Amazon’s ‘Melania’ documentary makes $7M on opening weekend
items.description: While the documentary is exceeding box office expectations, it's unlikely to make a profit in theaters.

items.title: Indonesia ‘conditionally’ lifts ban on Grok
items.description: Indonesia has followed Malaysia and the Philippines in lifting a ban on xAI’s chatbot Grok.

items.title: Why Tether’s CEO is everywhere right now
items.description: For years, Tether's CEO avoided the United States, watching from offshore as regulators circled and prosecutors investigated. Those days are over.

items.title: Cordless Stick Vacuum Throw Down: Bosch, Shark, Dyson (2026)
items.description: Bosch’s Unlimited 10 combines key features from Dyson’s and Shark’s stick vacuums and packs some nice extras, but it can’t seem to keep debris inside.
